主旋律
题目，话题

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含"文章，论文"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: composition, article, essay, paper, prose, thesis, theme, dissertation
means: composition ： 多指学校里老师给学生的作文练习。
article ： 多指在报刊、杂志上发表的非文艺性的文章，包括新闻报导、学术论文等。
essay ： 指任何一种非小说性的，篇幅不长、结构简练的文章，如论说文、报道、评论、讽刺性杂文等。
paper ： 正式用词，多指在学术刊物上发表或在学术会议上宣读的专题论文，也指高等学校的学期论文，或学校里的作文练习。
prose ： 专指散文。
thesis ： 既可指毕业论文、学位论文，又可指一般的为阐述学术观点而写的论文。
theme ： 一般指大学或高中生作为作业所写的篇幅有限、较完整论述某个观点的文章。也可指作品或谈话的主要论题。
dissertation ： 书面语用词，指独立研究后所写的较为详细的专题文章；也可指学位论文。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"主题，话题"之意。
means: issue ： 指有争论、议论，急需讨论研究的热点话题。
subject ： 一般用词，使用广泛。指书籍、文章、演讲、讨论等中所隐含的、暗示的，需要由读者或听众推断的主题或中心话题。
theme ： 系正式用词，多指文学、艺术作品的主题，或论文、演说的主题。
topic ： 普通用词，含义广泛，但其范畴小于subject。既可指文章、讲话的题目，谈话的内容，又可指提纲中的标题甚至段落的主题或中心思想。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含有"乐曲，曲调"之意。
means: melody ： 指悦耳的曲调旋律。
song ： 多指配有歌词的歌曲。
tune ： 指曲调，与配有歌词的歌曲相对。
theme ： 指主旋律。

sentence.Network_en: She embroidered on this theme for about ten minutes.
sentence.Network_cn: 她围绕这个主题添枝加叶地说了大约10分钟。

sentence.Network_en: Jones harps on this theme more than on any other.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个话题最能让琼斯唠叨个没完。

sentence.Network_en: Recent events have made his central theme even more apposite.
sentence.Network_cn: 新近发生的事情使得他的中心主题显得更加有的放矢。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: via Old French from Latin thema, from Greek, literally proposition'; related to tithenai 'to set or place'

entry.def: A theme in a piece of writing, a talk, or a discussion is an important idea or subject that runs through it.

example.ex: The theme of the conference is renaissance Europe...
example.tran: 大会的主题是文艺复兴时期的欧洲。

example.ex: 'That's another element in choosing a style of writing, you see,' he says, returning to his main theme...
example.tran: “瞧，那是选择写作风格时要考虑的又一个因素，”他又回到了主题上。

entry.tran: (艺术品、文学作品的)主题，中心思想
entry.def: A theme in an artist's work or in a work of literature is an idea in it that the artist or writer develops or repeats.

example.ex: The novel's central theme is the perennial conflict between men and women...
example.tran: 小说的主题是男人和女人之间永无休止的冲突。

example.ex: This painting points to another recurring theme in Munch's work.
example.tran: 这幅画体现了蒙克作品中另一个常见的主题。

entry.def: A theme is a short simple tune on which a piece of music is based.

example.ex: ...variations on themes from Mozart's The Magic Flute.
example.tran: 莫扎特的《魔笛》中主旋律的变奏曲

entry.tran: (电影、电视节目、广播节目的)主题音乐，主题曲
entry.def: Theme music or a theme song is a piece of music that is played at the beginning and end of a film or of a television or radio programme.

example.tran: 电影《日瓦戈医生》的主题曲

example.ex: The BBC used Vangelis's Chariots of Fire as its Olympic theme tune in 1984.
example.tran: BBC 选用了范吉利斯的《火战车》作为其 1984 年奥运节目的主题音乐。

means.word_mean: 1. the subject matter of a conversation or discussion;

sentences.sentence: "he didn't want to discuss that subject"
"his letters were always on the theme of love"

means.word_mean: 2. a unifying idea that is a recurrent element in a literary or artistic work;

sentences.sentence: "it was the usual `boy gets girl' theme"

means.word_mean: 3. (music) melodic subject of a musical composition;

sentences.sentence: "the theme is announced in the first measures"
"the accompanist picked up the idea and elaborated it"

means.word_mean: 4. an essay (especially one written as an assignment);

sentences.sentence: "he got an A on his composition"

means.word_mean: 5. (linguistics) the form of a word after all affixes are removed;

sentences.sentence: "thematic vowels are part of the stem"

means.word_mean: 1. provide with a particular theme or motive;

auth_sentence.content: It is a recurring theme for them this season.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is a recurring theme for them this season.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is a recurring theme for them this season.

auth_sentence.content: Even some whole lessons have had an international theme.
auth_sentence.res_content: Even some whole lessons have had an international theme.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Even some whole lessons have had an international theme.

auth_sentence.content: Getting away from it all is a recurring theme.
auth_sentence.res_content: Getting away from it all is a recurring theme.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Getting away from it all is a recurring theme.

Sentence.sentence: Teachers could encourage boys to enjoy reading and writing with "boy-focused" approaches such as themes and characters that appeal to them.
The question you are supposed to write about may seem outside the self, but the theme of the essay should center around its impact on you.

means.word_mean: （演讲、文章或艺术作品的）题目，主题，主旨，主题思想

sentences.en: Waterfalls are from very early times a favourite theme for the painter.
sentences.cn: 从很早时候起, 瀑布就是画家所喜爱的题材。

jushi.english: The main theme of the play was clear.
Waterfalls are from very early times a favorite theme for the painter.
jushi.chinese: 从很早时候起,瀑布就是画家所喜爱的题材。
